Bane_Spider_Armor.display_help: Your Bane Spider Armor Upgrade improves your overall health, protection to all damage types, as well as increasing your protection against most status effects, including Confuse, Fear, Disorient, Hold, Sleep and Immobilize effects.

Hide.display_help: Cloaking Device makes you almost impossible to detect. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Like most stealth powers, Cloaking Device cannot be used at the same time as other Concealment powers.

Surveillance.display_help: When this power is activated, you focus your senses to analyze your targets defensive capabilities and discover their weaknesses. By sharing your knowledge of the targets weaknesses with your team mates, you effectively reduce their defense and resistance to damage. Recharge: Slow
Surveillance.display_target_help: Your Defense and Resistance to damage has been reduced.

Web_Cocoon.display_help: The Bane Mace can fire a more powerful version the common web grenade. The sinewy fibers of this grenade are strong enough to completely Hold one target. Targets able to resist the Hold are still likely to have their attack and movement speed dramatically slowed. Web Cocoon can also bring down flying targets and prevent foes from jumping. Recharge: Long
Web_Cocoon.display_target_help: You have been caught in a Web Cocoon and are Held. You cannot move or fly and your attack and movement speed is reduced.

Crab_Spider_Armor.display_help: Your Crab Spider Armor Upgrade improves your protection to Smashing, Lethal and Psionic damage types, as well as increasing your protection against most status effects, including Confuse, Fear, Disorient, Hold, Sleep and Immobilize effects.
Crab_Spider_Armor.display_short_help: Auto: Self +RES(Smash, Lethal, Psionic, Status Effects)

Fortification.display_help: Crab Spiders armor may be reinforced to become far more resistant to all types of damage except Psionics, as well as increasing protection to Sleep, Hold, Immobilization and Disorient effects. Recharge: Fast
Fortification.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep, All DMG but Psionics)

Serum.display_help: You can activate this power to increase your maximum Hit Points for a short time. Recharge: Very Long
Serum.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your maximum Hit Points.

Summon_Spiderlings.display_help: As a Crab Spider you have access to a small squadron of Arachnobot Spiderlings. Three Spiderlings that are two levels less than you will show up when summoned. Recharge: Extremely Long

Wolf_Spider_Armor.display_help: Your Wolf Spider Armor provides good protection to Smashing, Lethal and Psionic damage types, as well as offering basic levels of protection to most status effects, including Confuse, Fear, Disorient, Hold, Sleep and Immobilize effects.
Wolf_Spider_Armor.display_short_help: Auto: Self +RES(Smash, Lethal, Psionic, Status Effects)

Combat_Training:_Defensive.display_help: You are more evasive to ranged attacks.

Tactical_Training:_Maneuvers.display_help: A good leader knows how to protect his team. While active, this power increases the Defense of yourself and all nearby teammates to all attacks. Recharge: Slow
Tactical_Training:_Maneuvers.display_target_help: Your Defense to all attacks is improved due to good teamwork and leadership.

Tactical_Training:_Assault.display_help: While this power is active, you and your nearby teammates deal more damage and are more resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.display_target_help: Your attack damage is improved due to good leadership and teamwork. You are resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.

Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_help: While this power is active, your chance to hit and that of all your nearby teammates' is increased. Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse and Fear effects. Additionally, your Perception is improved, allowing you to better detect Stealthy foes.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team +To Hit, Res(Confuse, Fear), +Perception
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and Perception is improved due to good teamwork and Leadership. You have moderate protection against Fear and Confuse effects, as well.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_attacker_hit: Your Tactical Training increases your team's chance to hit and Perception.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's chance to hit and Perception with their Tactical Training.

Mental_Training.display_help: Your mental training allows you to focus your will, allowing you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.
Mental_Training.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

Call_Reinforcements.display_help: As an Arachnos Soldier you have access to a small squadron of Arachnobot Disruptors. Two Disruptors that are one level less than you will show up when summoned. Recharge: Extremely Long
